title: VK API JSON Schema
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API objects and methods

methods.name: account.changePassword
methods.description: Changes a user password after access is successfully restored with the [vk.com/dev/auth.restore|auth.restore] method.

parameters.name: restore_sid
parameters.description: Session id received after the [vk.com/dev/auth.restore|auth.restore] method is executed. (If the password is changed right after the access was restored)

parameters.name: change_password_hash
parameters.description: Hash received after a successful OAuth authorization with a code got by SMS. (If the password is changed right after the access was restored)

parameters.name: old_password
parameters.description: Current user password.

parameters.name: new_password
parameters.description: New password that will be set as a current

methods.name: account.getActiveOffers
methods.description: Returns a list of active ads (offers) which executed by the user will bring him/her respective number of votes to his balance in the application.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of results to return.

methods.name: account.getAppPermissions
methods.description: Gets settings of the user in this application.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID whose settings information shall be got. By default: current user.

methods.name: account.getBanned
methods.description: Returns a user's blacklist.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of results to return.

methods.name: account.getCounters
methods.description: Returns non-null values of user counters.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Counters to be returned.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID

methods.name: account.getInfo
methods.description: Returns current account info.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields to return. Possible values: *'country' — user country,, *'https_required' — is "HTTPS only" option enabled,, *'own_posts_default' — is "Show my posts only" option is enabled,, *'no_wall_replies' — are wall replies disabled or not,, *'intro' — is intro passed by user or not,, *'lang' — user language. By default: all.

methods.name: account.getProfileInfo
methods.description: Returns the current account info.

methods.name: account.getPushSettings
methods.description: Gets settings of push notifications.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: Unique device ID.

methods.name: account.registerDevice
methods.description: Subscribes an iOS/Android/Windows Phone-based device to receive push notifications

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Device token used to send notifications. (for mpns, the token shall be URL for sending of notifications)

parameters.name: device_model
parameters.description: String name of device model.

parameters.name: device_year
parameters.description: Device year.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: Unique device ID.

parameters.name: system_version
parameters.description: String version of device operating system.

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: Push settings in a [vk.com/dev/push_settings|special format].

methods.name: account.saveProfileInfo
methods.description: Edits current profile info.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: User first name.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: User last name.

parameters.name: maiden_name
parameters.description: User maiden name (female only)

parameters.name: screen_name
parameters.description: User screen name.

parameters.name: cancel_request_id
parameters.description: ID of the name change request to be canceled. If this parameter is sent, all the others are ignored.

parameters.name: sex
parameters.description: User sex. Possible values: , * '1' - female,, * '2' - male.

parameters.name: relation
parameters.description: User relationship status. Possible values: , * '1' - single,, * '2' - in a relationship,, * '3' - engaged,, * '4' - married,, * '5' - it's complicated,, * '6' - actively searching,, * '7' - in love,, * '0' - not specified.

parameters.name: relation_partner_id
parameters.description: ID of the relationship partner.

parameters.name: bdate
parameters.description: User birth date, format: DD.MM.YYYY.

parameters.name: bdate_visibility
parameters.description: Birth date visibility. Returned values: , * '1' - show birth date,, * '2' - show only month and day,, * '0' - hide birth date.

parameters.name: home_town
parameters.description: User home town.

parameters.name: country_id
parameters.description: User country.

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: User city.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status text.

methods.name: account.setInfo
methods.description: Allows to edit the current account info.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Setting name.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Setting value.

methods.name: account.setOffline
methods.description: Marks a current user as offline.

methods.name: account.setOnline
methods.description: Marks the current user as online for 15 minutes.

parameters.name: voip
parameters.description: '1' if videocalls are available for current device.

methods.name: account.setPushSettings
methods.description: Change push settings.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: Unique device ID.

parameters.name: settings
parameters.description: Push settings in a [vk.com/dev/push_settings|special format].

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Notification key.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: New value for the key in a [vk.com/dev/push_settings|special format].

methods.name: account.setSilenceMode
methods.description: Mutes push notifications for the set period of time.

parameters.name: device_id
parameters.description: Unique device ID.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Time in seconds for what notifications should be disabled. '-1' to disable forever.

parameters.name: peer_id
parameters.description: Destination ID. "For user: 'User ID', e.g. '12345'. For chat: '2000000000' + 'Chat ID', e.g. '2000000001'. For community: '- Community ID', e.g. '-12345'. "

parameters.name: sound
parameters.description: '1' — to enable sound in this dialog, '0' — to disable sound. Only if 'peer_id' contains user or community ID.

methods.name: ads.getAds
methods.description: Returns number of ads.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Advertising account ID.

parameters.name: ad_ids
parameters.description: Filter by ads. Serialized JSON array with ad IDs. If the parameter is null, all ads will be shown.

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: Filter by advertising campaigns. Serialized JSON array with campaign IDs. If the parameter is null, ads of all campaigns will be shown.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: 'Available and required for advertising agencies.' ID of the client ads are retrieved from.

parameters.name: include_deleted
parameters.description: Flag that specifies whether archived ads shall be shown: *0 — show only active ads,, *1 — show all ads.

parameters.name: only_deleted
parameters.description: Flag that specifies whether to show only archived ads: *0 — show all ads,, *1 — show only archived ads. Available when include_deleted flag is *1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit of number of returned ads. Used only if ad_ids parameter is null, and 'campaign_ids' parameter contains ID of only one campaign.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset. Used in the same cases as 'limit' parameter.

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: Filter by advertising campaigns. Serialized JSON array with campaign IDs. If the parameter is null, ads of all campaigns will be shown.

methods.name: ads.getDemographics
methods.description: Returns demographics for ads or campaigns.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Advertising account ID.

parameters.name: ids_type
parameters.description: Type of requested objects listed in 'ids' parameter: *ad — ads,, *campaign — campaigns.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: IDs requested ads or campaigns, separated with a comma, depending on the value set in 'ids_type'. Maximum 2000 objects.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Data grouping by dates: *day — statistics by days,, *month — statistics by months,, *overall — overall statistics. 'date_from' and 'date_to' parameters set temporary limits.

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Date to show statistics from. For different value of 'period' different date format is used: *day: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2011-09-27 — September 27, 2011, **0 — day it was created on,, *month: YYYY-MM, example: 2011-09 — September 2011, **0 — month it was created in,, *overall: 0.

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Date to show statistics to. For different value of 'period' different date format is used: *day: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2011-09-27 — September 27, 2011, **0 — current day,, *month: YYYY-MM, example: 2011-09 — September 2011, **0 — current month,, *overall: 0.

methods.name: ads.getStatistics
methods.description: Returns statistics of performance indicators for ads, campaigns, clients or the whole account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Advertising account ID.

parameters.name: ids_type
parameters.description: Type of requested objects listed in 'ids' parameter: *ad — ads,, *campaign — campaigns,, *client — clients,, *office — account.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: IDs requested ads, campaigns, clients or account, separated with a comma, depending on the value set in 'ids_type'. Maximum 2000 objects.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Data grouping by dates: *day — statistics by days,, *month — statistics by months,, *overall — overall statistics. 'date_from' and 'date_to' parameters set temporary limits.

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Date to show statistics from. For different value of 'period' different date format is used: *day: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2011-09-27 — September 27, 2011, **0 — day it was created on,, *month: YYYY-MM, example: 2011-09 — September 2011, **0 — month it was created in,, *overall: 0.

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Date to show statistics to. For different value of 'period' different date format is used: *day: YYYY-MM-DD, example: 2011-09-27 — September 27, 2011, **0 — current day,, *month: YYYY-MM, example: 2011-09 — September 2011, **0 — current month,, *overall: 0.

parameters.name: stats_fields
parameters.description: Additional fields to add to statistics

methods.name: ads.getSuggestions
methods.description: Returns a set of auto-suggestions for various targeting parameters.

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Section, suggestions are retrieved in. Available values: *countries — request of a list of countries. If q is not set or blank, a short list of countries is shown. Otherwise, a full list of countries is shown. *regions — requested list of regions. 'country' parameter is required. *cities — requested list of cities. 'country' parameter is required. *districts — requested list of districts. 'cities' parameter is required. *stations — requested list of subway stations. 'cities' parameter is required. *streets — requested list of streets. 'cities' parameter is required. *schools — requested list of educational organizations. 'cities' parameter is required. *interests — requested list of interests. *positions — requested list of positions (professions). *group_types — requested list of group types. *religions — requested list of religious commitments. *browsers — requested list of browsers and mobile devices.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Objects IDs separated by commas. If the parameter is passed, 'q, country, cities' should not be passed.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Filter-line of the request (for countries, regions, cities, streets, schools, interests, positions).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ID of the country objects are searched in.

parameters.name: cities
parameters.description: IDs of cities where objects are searched in, separated with a comma.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language of the returned string values. Supported languages: *ru — Russian,, *ua — Ukrainian,, *en — English.

parameters.name: ad_format
parameters.description: Ad format. Possible values: *'1' — image and text,, *'2' — big image,, *'3' — exclusive format,, *'4' — community, square image,, *'7' — special app format,, *'8' — special community format,, *'9' — post in community,, *'10' — app board.

parameters.name: ad_platform
parameters.description: Platforms to use for ad showing. Possible values: (for 'ad_format' = '1'), *'0' — VK and partner sites,, *'1' — VK only. (for 'ad_format' = '9'), *'all' — all platforms,, *'desktop' — desktop version,, *'mobile' — mobile version and apps.

parameters.name: link_url
parameters.description: URL for the advertised object.

parameters.name: link_domain
parameters.description: Domain of the advertised object.

parameters.name: need_precise

parameters.name: impressions_limit_period
parameters.description: Impressions limit period in seconds, must be a multiple of 86400(day)

parameters.description: Application ID

parameters.description: List of application ID

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: platform. Possible values: *'ios' — iOS,, *'android' — Android,, *'winphone' — Windows Phone,, *'web' — приложения на vk.com. By default: 'web'.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return. Sample values: 'nickname', 'screen_name', 'sex', 'bdate' (birthdate), 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'photo', 'photo_medium', 'photo_big', 'has_mobile', 'contacts', 'education', 'online', 'counters', 'relation', 'last_seen', 'activity', 'can_write_private_message', 'can_see_all_posts', 'can_post', 'universities', (only if return_friends - 1)

parameters.name: name_case

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset required to return a specific subset of apps.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of apps to return.

parameters.name: extended

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: 'installed' — to return list of installed apps (only for mobile platform).

methods.name: board.getTopics
methods.description: Returns a list of topics on a community's discussion board.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID of the community that owns the discussion board.

parameters.name: topic_ids
parameters.description: IDs of topics to be returned (100 maximum). By default, all topics are returned. If this parameter is set, the 'order', 'offset', and 'count' parameters are ignored.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order: '1' — by date updated in reverse chronological order. '2' — by date created in reverse chronological order. '-1' — by date updated in chronological order. '-2' — by date created in chronological order. If no sort order is specified, topics are returned in the order specified by the group administrator. Pinned topics are returned first, regardless of the sorting.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of topics.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of topics to return.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' — to return information about users who created topics or who posted there last, '0' — to return no additional fields (default)

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: '1' — to return the first comment in each topic,, '2' — to return the last comment in each topic,, '0' — to return no comments. By default: '0'.

parameters.name: preview_length
parameters.description: Number of characters after which to truncate the previewed comment. To preview the full comment, specify '0'.

methods.name: likes.getList
methods.description: Returns a list of IDs of users who added the specified object to their 'Likes' list.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: , Object type: 'post' — post on user or community wall, 'comment' — comment on a wall post, 'photo' — photo, 'audio' — audio, 'video' — video, 'note' — note, 'photo_comment' — comment on the photo, 'video_comment' — comment on the video, 'topic_comment' — comment in the discussion, 'sitepage' — page of the site where the [vk.com/dev/Like|Like widget] is installed

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user, community, or application that owns the object. If the 'type' parameter is set as 'sitepage', the application ID is passed as 'owner_id'. Use negative value for a community id. If the 'type' parameter is not set, the 'owner_id' is assumed to be either the current user or the same application ID as if the 'type' parameter was set to 'sitepage'.

parameters.name: item_id
parameters.description: Object ID. If 'type' is set as 'sitepage', 'item_id' can include the 'page_id' parameter value used during initialization of the [vk.com/dev/Like|Like widget].

parameters.name: page_url
parameters.description: URL of the page where the [vk.com/dev/Like|Like widget] is installed. Used instead of the 'item_id' parameter.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filters to apply: 'likes' — returns information about all users who liked the object (default), 'copies' — returns information only about users who told their friends about the object

parameters.name: friends_only
parameters.description: Specifies which users are returned: '1' — to return only the current user's friends, '0' — to return all users (default)

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Specifies whether extended information will be returned. '1' — to return extended information about users and communities from the 'Likes' list, '0' — to return no additional information (default)

parameters.name: offset

parameters.name: attachments
parameters.description: (Required if 'message' is not set.) List of objects attached to the post, in the following format: "<owner_id>_<media_id>,<owner_id>_<media_id>", '' — Type of media attachment: 'photo' — photo, 'video' — video, 'audio' — audio, 'doc' — document, 'page' — wiki-page, 'note' — note, 'poll' — poll, 'album' — photo album, '<owner_id>' — ID of the media application owner. '<media_id>' — Media application ID. Example: "photo100172_166443618,photo66748_265827614", May contain a link to an external page to include in the post. Example: "photo66748_265827614,http://habrahabr.ru", "NOTE: If more than one link is being attached, an error will be thrown."

parameters.name: signed
parameters.description: Only for posts in communities with 'from_group' set to '1': '1' — post will be signed with the name of the posting user, '0' — post will not be signed (default)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Geographical latitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -90 to 90).

parameters.name: long
parameters.description: Geographical longitude of a check-in, in degrees (from -180 to 180).

parameters.name: place_id
parameters.description: ID of the location where the user was tagged.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: Unique identifier to avoid duplication the same post.

parameters.name: link_button
parameters.description: Link button ID

parameters.name: link_title
parameters.description: Link title

parameters.name: link_image
parameters.description: Link image url

parameters.name: link_video
parameters.description: Link video ID in format "<owner_id>_<media_id>"

methods.name: wall.reportComment
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a comment on a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the wall.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: '0' - spam, '1' - child pornography, '2' - extremism, '3' - violence, '4' - drug propaganda, '5' - adult material, '6' - insult, abuse

methods.name: wall.reportPost
methods.description: Reports (submits a complaint about) a post on a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the wall.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Reason for the complaint: '0' - spam, '1' - child pornography, '2' - extremism, '3' - violence, '4' - drug propaganda, '5' - adult material, '6' - insult, abuse

methods.name: wall.repost
methods.description: Reposts (copies) an object to a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: object
parameters.description: ID of the object to be reposted on the wall. Example: "wall66748_3675"

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Comment to be added along with the reposted object.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Target community ID when reposting to a community.

methods.name: wall.restore
methods.description: Restores a post deleted from a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID from whose wall the post was deleted. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: ID of the post to be restored.

methods.name: wall.restoreComment
methods.description: Restores a comment deleted from a user wall or community wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: User ID or community ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Comment ID.

methods.name: wall.search
methods.description: Allows to search posts on user or community walls.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: user or community id. "Remember that for a community 'owner_id' must be negative."

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: user or community screen name.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: search query string.

parameters.name: owners_only
parameters.description: '1' - returns only page owner's posts.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: count of posts to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of posts.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: show extended post info.

methods.name: wall.unpin
methods.description: Unpins the post on wall.

parameters.name: owner_id
parameters.description: ID of the user or community that owns the wall. By default, current user ID. Use a negative value to designate a community ID.

parameters.name: post_id
parameters.description: Post ID.

methods.name: widgets.getComments
methods.description: Gets a list of comments for the page added through the [vk.com/dev/Comments|Comments widget].

methods.name: widgets.getPages
methods.description: Gets a list of application/site pages where the [vk.com/dev/Comments|Comments widget] or [vk.com/dev/Like|Like widget] is installed.
